thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 12 of 265
thread.title: Pamela

author: Pamela
title: Pamela
text: We have been using Hello Fresh for only 3 wks, but have been thoroughly pleased. We have been using another service for over two years, but it seemed to be getting a little monotonous. Love the fact that you package all the ingredients for each meal into a separate inner box. We like the fact that we can select 3 of 6 meals with no exclusions. I would prefer to receive an email saying these are your meals for this week and here are your meals for next week so you always have time to change your selections or cancel the next delivery if needed.
